help.description: Returns a list of commands, you are able to use or informations about a specific command!

error.unknown: This command is unknown. Use `$0help` for a list of commands.

options.command: The command you need help with

register.description: Registers yourself to the server with your ingame name.
register.success: You successfully registered yourself with the ingame name `$0`
register.user_registered: Your ingame name `$0` was already registered
register.guild_notfound: Your characters guild (ingame name `$0`) seems to be missing in our alliance
register.albion_notfound: We couldn't find your ingame character `$0`

addGuild.description: Adds a guild to the alliance (for this bot)
addGuild.general_error: ERROR: Couldn't find guild `$0` in albion

removeGuild.description: Removes a guild from the alliance (for this bot)
